hero.subtitle: UCYX is a future-focused, AI-driven consultancy dedicated to helping brands uncover unique "X-trodinary" in the complex cross-border e-commerce market.

dataPower.title: Data-Driven Insight
dataPower.subtitle: Every strategic recommendation we make is rooted in deep learning and analysis of massive datasets.

services.title: Everything you need to achieve extraordinary growth
services.subtitle: Our comprehensive AI-driven methodology covers every aspect of your e-commerce journey.

feature1.title: Novochoice
feature1.description: Discover high-potential niches with Novochoice™ Opportunity Quadrant, powered by AI analysis of massive datasets.

feature2.title: Brand Smart
feature2.description: Through the UCselection™ Value Proposition Canvas, co-create a product prototype with a compelling "X-factor".

feature3.title: Launch to Win
feature3.description: Execute successful launches across global platforms with integrated marketing solutions.

feature4.title: Lasting Success
feature4.description: Achieve sustained growth with our UCcopilot™ AI-driven optimization system.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.subtitle: We partner with global market pioneers, whether you are an established brand seeking expansion or a startup with a great product.

card1.title: Established Brands
card1.description: You have successful products and a stable business but are eager to enter new markets to find your next growth curve.

card2.title: Startups with Great Ideas
card2.description: You have created an outstanding ideas but lack the approach to turn into product and brand.

card3.title: Traditional Manufacture
card3.description: You have a great product but lack the go-to-market strategy and brand marketing experience for platforms like Amazon or Shopify.

whoWeServe.seeCasesLink: How do we prove our value with data? See our success stories ↓

successStories.title: Our Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: We don't just deliver strategies, we deliver measurable results.

cases.title: Entering the Asian Market from Scratch
cases.description: Using the Novochoice™ data platform, we identified a high-potential niche market on China e-commerce platforms and with UCselection™ service, we helped defining a value proposition tailored to Asian consumer preferences, exceeding sales forecasts by 300% in the first month.

cases.title: Reshaping User Loyalty with Review Insights
cases.description: We analyze 5k customer reviews amongst the top 10 hot selling items, and uncovered core produce improvement opportunities and optimized selling material which increased the repeat purchase rate by 50% within six months.

cases.title: Amazon New Product Launch Optimization
cases.description: Leveraging UCcopilot™ for intelligent ad campaign optimization, we increased the click-through conversion rate for their new product on Amazon US by 75% and reduced ACoS by 40%, without increasing the ad budget.

cases.title: Shopify DTC Sales Forecasting
cases.description: With the UCforecast™ model, we provided an accurate sales forecast for their new product line targeting the North American market. This helped optimize their inventory strategy, achieving a 95% sell-through rate for the initial stock.

methodology.title: The UCYX Value Growth Methodology™
methodology.subtitle: We don't offer scattered advice. We deliver a systematic, verifiable blueprint for success.

steps.title: Market Scanning & Opportunity Unlocking
steps.description: Using our proprietary Novochoice Opportunity Quadrant Model, combined with AI data analysis, we quickly identify high-potential "value basins" from hundreds of niche markets for you.

steps.title: Deep Insight & Product Definition
steps.description: Through the UCselection™ Value Proposition Canvas, we reverse-engineer competitor reviews and user pain points to co-create a product prototype with a compelling "X-factor".

steps.title: Viability & Growth Path
steps.description: Leveraging the UCforecast™ sales prediction model using ML for P&L scenario planning, we use the "Brand Growth Path Matrix" to map out a clear 1-to-N journey for your business.

steps.title: Platform Success & Continuous Optimization
steps.description: With the UCcopilot™ AI assistant, we continuously optimize your platform operations, advertising, and customer experience to ensure your brand not only launches successfully but thrives.

brands.title: Advanced Market Intelligence Platform
brands.description: Novochoice is UCYX's advanced market intelligence platform that combines artificial intelligence, big data analytics, and real-time monitoring to provide comprehensive insights into e-commerce opportunities worldwide.
